content: stash basket materials size base x height 14c​ m x 12 5cm small basket 18cm x 17cm ​large basket yarn fibra natura cottonwood 105m/50g or any 8ply/dk weight yarn please note that yarn is held double throughout quantity 1 2 balls each in two colours hook 5mm gauge 14 5 sts and 16 row to 10cm in double_crochet gauge is not critical for this project but the firmer your fabric the better it will stand up materials stitch marker yarn needle notes - this pattern is written using uk crochet terminology - yarn is held double throughout you can hold the same two together throughout or change colours as you go to create a fade - when changing colour it s a good idea to work over your tails as you go as they can be tricky to sew in with the thick yarn 1 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2020 abbreviations r8 work 1dc in next 6 sts increase in next repeat to end 48sts chain chain r9 work 1dc in next 7 sts increase in next 1dc work 1 double_crochet repeat to end 54sts increase increase work 2 double_crochet in next stitch r10 work 1dc in next 8 sts increase in next repeat to end 60sts slip_stitch slip_stitch for large size only sts stitches r11 work 1dc in next 9 sts increase in next round round repeat to end 66sts r1 round 1 r12 work 1dc in next 10 sts increase in next repeat to end 72sts r13 work 1dc in next 11 sts increase in next pattern repeat to end 78sts note - for the base section it is a good idea to r14 work 1dc in next 12 sts increase in next use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of the repeat to end 84sts round continue to move the marker along with you by replacing it in the first stitch of each round sides all sizes starting with two strands of yarn held together work base as follows setup working in back loops only work 1dc in each st stopping 1 st before marker r1 ch2 then work 6dc into second chain from 1dc in last stitch as normal no hook 6sts total increases r2 increase in each stitch around 12sts work 1dc in each stitch as normal all the way around and continue doing so until sides r3 work 1dc in first stitch increase in next measure 12 5cm 14cm from start of the sides repeat to end 18sts r4 work 1dc in next 2 sts increase in next repeat to end 24sts r5 work 1dc in next 3 sts increase in next repeat to end 30sts r6 work 1dc in next 4 sts increase in next repeat to end 36sts r7 work 1dc in next 5 sts increase in next repeat to end 42sts 2 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2020 handles large size only finishing all sizes handle r1 ​ work 1dc in next 30 sts chain
